# ESCO Integration Checklist

- [x] Research ESCO classification structure (concepts, skills, occupations).
- [x] Search for direct SSYK to ESCO crosswalk/mapping (None existing).
- [x] Search for SSYK to ISCO-08 mapping (Found: SCB Excel).
- [x] Search for ISCO-08 to ESCO mapping (Found: ESCO Dataset via iscoGroup).
- [x] Evaluate available data formats (CSV, API, RDF) for ESCO (Direct links removed, manual DL required from esco.ec.europa.eu).
- [x] Define integration strategy (SSYK -> ISCO -> ESCO).
- [x] Inspect existing AF Taxonomy Skills for ESCO URIs (No direct ESCO IDs found).
- [x] Download SCB SSYK->ISCO mapping file (Verified URL and structure).
- [ ] Download ESCO dataset (Occupations + Skills + Relations).
- [ ] Implement ESCO data ingestion.
- [ ] Implement mapping logic to enrich SSYK occupations with ESCO skills.
